Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent
Tool.Enabled = true function onActivated() vCharacter = Tool.Parent if vCharacter == nil then return end humanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid == nil then return end if not Tool.Enabled or humanoid.Jump then return end Tool.Enabled = false print("started activation") rightArm = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if rightArm == nil then return end fog = {} newBF = {}
magicSound = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("MagicSound") if magicSound == nil then magicSound = Instance.new("Sound") magicSound.Parent = Tool.Handle magicSound.Volume = 1 magicSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=35895627" -- 35895627 is cauldronFire -- 35895661 is cauldronWater magicSound.Name = "MagicSound" end slushy = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("SlushySound") if slushy == nil then slushy = Instance.new("Sound") slushy.Parent = Tool.Handle slushy.Volume = 1 slushy.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=35895661" slushy.Name = "SlushySound" end magicSound.Looped = true slushy.Looped = true magicSound:Play() slushy:Play()
for i = 1,10 do fog[i] = rightArm:Clone() fog[i].Name = "Fog" fog[i].Velocity = Vector3.new(5*math.sin(i*math.pi/5),5,5*math.cos(i*math.pi/5)) fog[i].Transparency = 1 fog[i].CanCollide = false fog[i].Parent = Tool.Parent -- for now foggy = Instance.new("Smoke") foggy.Color = Color3.new(1,1,1) foggy.Size = Vector3.new(27,27,27) foggy.Parent = fog[i] newBF[i] = Instance.new("BodyForce") newBF[i].force = Vector3.new(0, 195*fog[i]:GetMass(), 0) newBF[i].Name = "FogLift" newBF[i].Parent = fog[i] foggy.Enabled = true wait(.1) end
wait(1) for i = 1, 10 do fog[i].Velocity = Vector3.new(0,0,0) wait(.1) end
wait(2) magicSound:Stop() slushy:Stop() wait(2) for i = 1, 10 do fog[i].Velocity = Vector3.new(0,0,0) newBF[i].force = Vector3.new(0, 196*fog[i]:GetMass(), 0) wait (.1) end wait(6) for i = 1, 10 do fog[i].Parent = nil wait(.1) end print("ended activation") Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() print("started equipping") magicSound = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("MagicSound") if magicSound == nil then magicSound = Instance.new("Sound") magicSound.Parent = Tool.Handle magicSound.Volume = 1 magicSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=35895627" -- 35895627 is cauldronFire -- 35895661 is cauldronWater magicSound.Name = "MagicSound" end slushy = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("SlushySound") if slushy == nil then slushy = Instance.new("Sound") slushy.Parent = Tool.Handle slushy.Volume = 1 slushy.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=35895661" slushy.Name = "SlushySound" end print("finished equipping") end
function onUnequip() magicSound = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("MagicSound") slushy = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("SlushySound") if magicSound ~= nil then magicSound:Stop() magicSound.Parent = nil end if slushy ~= nil then slushy:Stop() slushy.Parent = nil end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequip)

local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end print("ending") enabled = false
while Tool.Enabled do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse To Wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
while not Tool.Enabled do wait(.01) end
print("Setting Mouse to Go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png"
enabled = true end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal)
